00031 #include <nfc/nfc.h>
00032 #include <nfc/nfc-emulation.h>
00033 
00034 #include "iso7816.h"
00035 
00046 int
00047 nfc_emulate_target(nfc_device *pnd, struct nfc_emulator *emulator, const int timeout)
00048 {
00049   uint8_t abtRx[ISO7816_SHORT_R_APDU_MAX_LEN];
00050   uint8_t abtTx[ISO7816_SHORT_C_APDU_MAX_LEN];
00051 
00052   int res;
00053   if ((res = nfc_target_init(pnd, emulator->target, abtRx, sizeof(abtRx), timeout)) < 0) {
00054     return res;
00055   }
00056 
00057   size_t szRx = res;
00058   int io_res = res;
00059   while (io_res >= 0) {
00060     io_res = emulator->state_machine->io(emulator, abtRx, szRx, abtTx, sizeof(abtTx));
00061     if (io_res > 0) {
00062       if ((res = nfc_target_send_bytes(pnd, abtTx, io_res, timeout)) < 0) {
00063         return res;
00064       }
00065     }
00066     if (io_res >= 0) {
00067       if ((res = nfc_target_receive_bytes(pnd, abtRx, sizeof(abtRx), timeout)) < 0) {
00068         return res;
00069       }
00070       szRx = res;
00071     }
00072   }
00073   return (io_res < 0) ? io_res : 0;
00074 }
